messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Speed is a ninja’s best weapon!
Can you keep up?
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT: I did a lot to conceal myself, too...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I’ll wait here for a weaker-looking
Trainer and then ambush them!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I became even faster!
How can you hope to keep up?
